property.name: text
property.value: No impulsive force on other balls

property.name: text
property.value: This model does not handle causally unrelated simulaneous collisions, but it does correctly handle causally related simultaneous collisions.

svg.text: The transition from the init state to the run state initializes the positions and velocities of the balls. A transition is taken from the run state back to itself when a collision occurs. A collision occurs when two adjacent balls make contact with velocity greater than zero.

property.name: text
property.value: Note that the nondeterministic transitions do not properly handle simultaneous collisions from both sides because there needs to be agreement between balls on which collision is handled first.

property.name: text
property.value: Parameter values inherited from up in the hierarchy:
